Browse the source code of codebrowser/nest/third-party/algorithm/lzma/7zFile.c

1/* 7zFile.c -- File IO
2 2009-11-24 : Igor Pavlov : Public domain */
3
4#include "7zFile.h"
5
6#ifndef USE_WINDOWS_FILE
7
8#ifndef UNDER_CE
9#include <errno.h>
10#endif
11
12#else
13
14/*
15 ReadFile and WriteFile functions in Windows have BUG:
16 If you Read or Write 64MB or more (probably min_failure_size = 64MB - 32KB + 1)
17 from/to Network file, it returns ERROR_NO_SYSTEM_RESOURCES
18 (Insufficient system resources exist to complete the requested service).
19 Probably in some version of Windows there are problems with other sizes:
20 for 32 MB (maybe also for 16 MB).
21 And message can be "Network connection was lost"
22 */
23
24#define kChunkSizeMax (1 << 22)
25
26#endif
27
28void File_Construct(CSzFile *p)
29{
30#ifdef USE_WINDOWS_FILE
31 p->handle = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
32#else
33 p->file = NULL;
34#endif
35}
36
37#if !defined(UNDER_CE) || !defined(USE_WINDOWS_FILE)
38static WRes File_Open(CSzFile *p, const char *name, int writeMode)
39{
40#ifdef USE_WINDOWS_FILE
41 p->handle = CreateFileA(name,
42 writeMode ? GENERIC_WRITE : GENERIC_READ,
43 FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL,
44 writeMode ? CREATE_ALWAYS : OPEN_EXISTING,
45 FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
46 return (p->handle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) ? 0 : GetLastError();
47#else
48 p->file = fopen(name, writeMode ? "wb+" : "rb");
49 return (p->file != 0) ? 0 :
50#ifdef UNDER_CE
51 2; /* ENOENT */
52#else
53 errno;
54#endif
55#endif
56}
57
58WRes InFile_Open(CSzFile *p, const char *name)
59{
60 return File_Open(p, name, 0);
61}
62WRes OutFile_Open(CSzFile *p, const char *name)
63{
64 return File_Open(p, name, 1);
65}
66#endif
67
68#ifdef USE_WINDOWS_FILE
69static WRes File_OpenW(CSzFile *p, const WCHAR *name, int writeMode)
70{
71 p->handle = CreateFileW(name,
72 writeMode ? GENERIC_WRITE : GENERIC_READ,
73 FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL,
74 writeMode ? CREATE_ALWAYS : OPEN_EXISTING,
75 FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
76 return (p->handle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) ? 0 : GetLastError();
77}
78WRes InFile_OpenW(CSzFile *p, const WCHAR *name)
79{ return File_OpenW(p, name, 0);}
80WRes OutFile_OpenW(CSzFile *p, const WCHAR *name)
81{ return File_OpenW(p, name, 1);}
82#endif
83
84WRes File_Close(CSzFile *p)
85{
86#ifdef USE_WINDOWS_FILE
87 if (p->handle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
88 {
89 if (!CloseHandle(p->handle))
90 return GetLastError();
91 p->handle = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
92 }
93#else
94 if (p->file != NULL)
95 {
96 int res = fclose(p->file);
97 if (res != 0)
98 return res;
99 p->file = NULL;
100 }
101#endif
102 return 0;
103}
104
105WRes File_Read(CSzFile *p, void *data, size_t *size)
106{
107 size_t originalSize = *size;
108 if (originalSize == 0)
109 return 0;
110
111#ifdef USE_WINDOWS_FILE
112
113 *size = 0;
114 do
115 {
116 DWORD curSize = (originalSize > kChunkSizeMax) ? kChunkSizeMax : (DWORD)originalSize;
117 DWORD processed = 0;
118 BOOL res = ReadFile(p->handle, data, curSize, &processed, NULL);
119 data = (void *)((Byte *)data + processed);
120 originalSize -= processed;
121 *size += processed;
122 if (!res)
123 return GetLastError();
124 if (processed == 0)
125 break;
126 }
127 while (originalSize > 0);
128 return 0;
129
130#else
131
132 *size = fread(data, 1, originalSize, p->file);
133 if (*size == originalSize)
134 return 0;
135 return ferror(p->file);
136
137#endif
138}
139
140WRes File_Write(CSzFile *p, const void *data, size_t *size)
141{
142 size_t originalSize = *size;
143 if (originalSize == 0)
144 return 0;
145
146#ifdef USE_WINDOWS_FILE
147
148 *size = 0;
149 do
150 {
151 DWORD curSize = (originalSize > kChunkSizeMax) ? kChunkSizeMax : (DWORD)originalSize;
152 DWORD processed = 0;
153 BOOL res = WriteFile(p->handle, data, curSize, &processed, NULL);
154 data = (void *)((Byte *)data + processed);
155 originalSize -= processed;
156 *size += processed;
157 if (!res)
158 return GetLastError();
159 if (processed == 0)
160 break;
161 }
162 while (originalSize > 0);
163 return 0;
164
165#else
166
167 *size = fwrite(data, 1, originalSize, p->file);
168 if (*size == originalSize)
169 return 0;
170 return ferror(p->file);
171
172#endif
173}
174
175WRes File_Seek(CSzFile *p, Int64 *pos, ESzSeek origin)
176{
177#ifdef USE_WINDOWS_FILE
178
179 LARGE_INTEGER value;
180 DWORD moveMethod;
181 value.LowPart = (DWORD)*pos;
182 value.HighPart = (LONG)((UInt64)*pos >> 16 >> 16); /* for case when UInt64 is 32-bit only */
183 switch (origin)
184 {
185 case SZ_SEEK_SET: moveMethod = FILE_BEGIN; break;
186 case SZ_SEEK_CUR: moveMethod = FILE_CURRENT; break;
187 case SZ_SEEK_END: moveMethod = FILE_END; break;
188 default: return ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER;
189 }
190 value.LowPart = SetFilePointer(p->handle, value.LowPart, &value.HighPart, moveMethod);
191 if (value.LowPart == 0xFFFFFFFF)
192 {
193 WRes res = GetLastError();
194 if (res != NO_ERROR)
195 return res;
196 }
197 *pos = ((Int64)value.HighPart << 32) | value.LowPart;
198 return 0;
199
200#else
201
202 int moveMethod;
203 int res;
204 switch (origin)
205 {
206 case SZ_SEEK_SET:
207 moveMethod = SEEK_SET;
208 break;
209 case SZ_SEEK_CUR:
210 moveMethod = SEEK_CUR;
211 break;
212 case SZ_SEEK_END:
213 moveMethod = SEEK_END;
214 break;
215 default:
216 return 1;
217 }
218 res = fseek(p->file, (long) *pos, moveMethod);
219 *pos = ftell(p->file);
220 return res;
221
222#endif
223}
224
225WRes File_GetLength(CSzFile *p, UInt64 *length)
226{
227#ifdef USE_WINDOWS_FILE
228
229 DWORD sizeHigh;
230 DWORD sizeLow = GetFileSize(p->handle, &sizeHigh);
231 if (sizeLow == 0xFFFFFFFF)
232 {
233 DWORD res = GetLastError();
234 if (res != NO_ERROR)
235 return res;
236 }
237 *length = (((UInt64)sizeHigh) << 32) + sizeLow;
238 return 0;
239
240#else
241
242 long pos = ftell(p->file);
243 int res = fseek(p->file, 0, SEEK_END);
244 *length = ftell(p->file);
245 fseek(p->file, pos, SEEK_SET);
246 return res;
247
248#endif
249}
250
251/* ---------- FileSeqInStream ---------- */
252
253static SRes FileSeqInStream_Read(void *pp, void *buf, size_t *size)
254{
255 CFileSeqInStream *p = (CFileSeqInStream *) pp;
256 return File_Read(&p->file, buf, size) == 0 ? SZ_OK : SZ_ERROR_READ;
257}
258
259void FileSeqInStream_CreateVTable(CFileSeqInStream *p)
260{
261 p->s.Read = FileSeqInStream_Read;
262}
263
264/* ---------- FileInStream ---------- */
265
266static SRes FileInStream_Read(void *pp, void *buf, size_t *size)
267{
268 CFileInStream *p = (CFileInStream *) pp;
269 return (File_Read(&p->file, buf, size) == 0) ? SZ_OK : SZ_ERROR_READ;
270}
271
272static SRes FileInStream_Seek(void *pp, Int64 *pos, ESzSeek origin)
273{
274 CFileInStream *p = (CFileInStream *) pp;
275 return File_Seek(&p->file, pos, origin);
276}
277
278void FileInStream_CreateVTable(CFileInStream *p)
279{
280 p->s.Read = FileInStream_Read;
281 p->s.Seek = FileInStream_Seek;
282}
283
284/* ---------- FileOutStream ---------- */
285
286static size_t FileOutStream_Write(void *pp, const void *data, size_t size)
287{
288 CFileOutStream *p = (CFileOutStream *) pp;
289 File_Write(&p->file, data, &size);
290 return size;
291}
292
293void FileOutStream_CreateVTable(CFileOutStream *p)
294{
295 p->s.Write = FileOutStream_Write;
296}
